State of Ohio
Hamilton County
City of Cincinnati } Sct

Robert A. Johnston on oath says that he is a citizen of Hamilton Couonty Ohio, that he has been appointed a Commissioner to take the acknowledgment of deeds &c for the State of Kentucky in Ohio by the Governor of the Commonwealth of Kentucky and that as such Comissioner he will well and truly execute and perform all the duties of said apppointment -- and further saith not
Sworn to and subscribed before me this 3d day of December AD 1863

Abram Brower Jr
Notary Public
Hamilton Co Ohio
R J 1865

Ohio
Comr Deeds
Oath
Robt Johnston
10th Dec/63
